result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

defendant.name: Conover, Ashley Marie

records.addlTxt:
CASH BOND $1000 - POSTED  7/28/2022


No Contact with D.J.R.  dob:  8/13/1985

ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY/ No Possession or Consumption of Alcoholic Beverages.  May not possess any controlled substance or paraphernalia.     No drug use without a valid prescription and if prescribed must take as DR ordered.  

Defendant shall be subject to testing of their blood, breath, saliva and/or urine to ensure compliance with absolute sobriety provision. Within 24 hours of release from custody (not including weekends/holidays) defendant shall report to Justice Point Pre-Trial Services at 10610 Main Street Suite 101, Hayward, WI 54843. Phone: 715-804-0109 OR 715-961-0149 for orientation and to establish testing procedures and options.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt:
8:45 AM Defendant Ashley Marie Conover in court.  Attorney Gabriel Andres Pollak in court for Ashley Marie Conover.  Attorney Jennifer Gross in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and recites appearances. DEF received copy of criminal complaint in court on this date.  DEF verifies DOB and address.  Attny Pollak unable to review criminal complaint with DEF.  Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint.  Court enters NG Plea to Count 2.   Through Attorney DEF waives time limits for Preliminary hearing, but sets preliminary hearing.  Next Court Appearance Card completed by Court Officer and given to DEF.    Court directs DEF to sign corrected bond at Clerk of Courts office.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for November 22, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on November 22, 2022 at 09:30 am.

sent to DE re: bond condition correction - testing info was incorrect

No Contact with D.J.R.  dob:  8/13/1985
	ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY/ No Possession or Consumption of Alcoholic Beverages. No drug use and may not possess any controlled substance  without a valid prescription and if prescribed must take as DR ordered.
	May not be on the premises of any establishment that serves alcoholic beverages.
	Defendant shall be subject to RANDOM TESTING of his/her blood, breath or urine, as defined by the Sawyer County Bail/Bond Monitoring Program and is ordered to report to Health and Human Services at 10610 Main Street, Hayward, WI, #715-638-3317  within 24 hours upon release from custody (not counting weekends and holidays) to establish the procedures for the testing.

11:03 AM  Court calls case and recites appearances. Commissioner W Winton presiding. ADA Sortedahl appears for the State. Defendant  ASHLEY M CONOVER appeared by video, in custody. Atty Pollack appearing for  DE Ashley Conover. PC found by Judge Yackel per PC Statement. State makes argument and requests $ 2500.00 cash bond, conditions: ABS  and No Contact w/DJR, DOB: 8/13/85.  Atty Pollack makes statement and requests $1500.00 sig bond w/Justice Point. Court addresses parties, sets $ 1000.00 cash bond w/conditions: No Contact  w/ DJR DOB: 8/13/1985. ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY/ No Possession or Consumption of Alcoholic Beverages.  May not possess any controlled substance or paraphernalia.     No drug use without a valid prescription and if prescribed must take as DR ordered.  

Defendant shall be subject to testing of their blood, breath, saliva and/or urine to ensure compliance with absolute sobriety provision. Within 24 hours of release from custody (not including weekends/holidays) defendant shall report to Justice Point Pre-Trial Services at 10610 Main Street Suite 101, Hayward, WI 54843. Phone: 715-804-0109 OR 715-961-0149 for orientation and to establish testing procedures and options.  

DE addresses Court, is unable to afford $ 1000.00 cash bond.  State makes comment.  Atty Pollack addresses Court.  Court makes comments.  Bond stays as set.
Hearing scheduled for August 23, 2022 at 08:30 am.

SIGNED PC ATTACHED 
CONOVER, ASHLEY M - DOB: 10-06-1986
